name: ETTIN BFFs
description:
The ettin Luna and Ronni found the best place to pick flowers! They grow so nicely in the king's garden, but it seems like he wants them for himself.

Can be played by one or two-players co-op. The intended way to play is with two players sharing only one controller and avatar in the game, but it is fine to play by yourself.

Keyboard: Use WASD and the arrow keys to control the two-headed pacifistic giant. Left and right control to punch or do a quick turn if both are pressed at the same time.

Controller: Use both sticks to control the two-headed pacifistic giant. Press the sticks to punch or do a quick turn if both are pressed at the same time.

Made in Unity, Pyxel Edit, sfxr, and Bosca Ceoil.
